name: Claustrophobia (flpguima)
description:
The walls grow closer around you as anxiety prevails. Those pills make you calm, let you breath for a moment and recover some sense of scale.

In Claustrophobia, you control a blue rectangle in search of freedom from oppressing black walls. During your journey, yellow pills will give you more room to navigate the world.

Don’t get trapped between walls as you escape.

Instructions

Select a level in the Levels Menu

Walk with A and D or the arrow keys

Jump with W or UP arrow or SPACE

R restarts the current level

P or ESC pause the game
